content:
A party of Kanphat Yogis resting around a fire

by Mas’ud

India, Mughal dynasty, 1630-40

Tinted drawing with gold; on an album leaf with an inner border of marbled paper and an outer border of leaf motifs in blue and gold.

content:
Wadhwa’s citation reads: @BSF_India picquet at Raja Mohtam near Mamdot on western front were occupied by enemy on Dec 5, 1971

ASSISTANT COMMANDANT RK WADHWA

was assigned the task of recapturing.
He led his troops gallantly thru heavily-mined area, under intense & accurate fire. https://t.co/kJXKuxAolU
